Contradict fact: The claim that the letter was issued by the Western Australia Police Force contradicts the fact that the letter was not issued by the organization, as confirmed by a spokesperson from the WA Police Force.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is no evidence or official statement from the Western Australia Police Force to validate the authenticity of the letter.

Exist alternative explanation: An alternative explanation could be that the letter was fabricated or falsely attributed to the Western Australia Police Force by an anonymous individual or group.
